Text.Name: SuperPart_Boar_1
Text.Desc: A secret body naturally possessed by boar Yaoguai that remolds the bristles around the neck with techniques. Once achieved, it can be attached to any attacks to increase the Qi barrier penetration chance of all secret bodies.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Drastically increases the Qi barrier penetration of the physical cultivator's all secret bodies.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Boar_2
Text.Desc: A secret body naturally possessed by boar Yaoguai that attaches the Force of Destruction to their sharp tusks, one strike will be powerful enough to obliterate anything.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration chance by a huge amount.
